job_tasks.phrase: Designing, developing, and implementing end-to-end web applications using modern frameworks and technologies
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes core software development activities focused on building complete applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Building efficient and scalable back-end systems and APIs for seamless data integration
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the development of server-side logic and interfaces, a key aspect of software integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Creating intuitive user interfaces and engaging user experiences using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
job_tasks.justification: This describes front-end development, which is part of the overall software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with interdisciplinary teams to gather requirements and translate them into technical solutions
job_tasks.justification: Translating business requirements into technical solutions is a fundamental software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Conducting thorough testing and debugging to ensure the quality and performance of the developed applications
job_tasks.justification: Testing and debugging are essential parts of the software development process to ensure quality.

job_tasks.phrase: Providing technical support and troubleshooting for existing software systems
job_tasks.justification: This involves maintaining and supporting software after deployment, a common software engineering responsibility.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborating with interdisciplinary teams to gather requirements and translate them into technical solutions
soft_skills.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions collaboration with teams.

soft_skills.phrase: Staying up to date with the latest trends in the industry and emerging technologies to continuously improve development practices
soft_skills.justification: This indicates a need for continuous learning and adaptation to new technologies.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses exclusively on traditional full-stack web development tasks, including designing, developing, and implementing web applications, back-end systems, APIs, and user interfaces. It mentions standard web technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. There is no mention of AI, Machine Learning, Generative AI, or related concepts, which are the defining characteristics of the other profiles. Therefore, the role is classified as a Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about its requirements, focusing solely on traditional software development. There are no ambiguous terms or mentions of AI/ML that would complicate the classification, making the analysis straightforward and highly confident.
